SELECT a.JNL_NO AS jnlNo, a.TX_STAT AS txStat, a.TX_CODE AS txCode, a.TX_REJ_REASON AS rejReason, c.SETTLEMENT_CUR AS settlementCur, c.SETTLEMENT_AMT AS settlementAmt, c.SETTLEMENT_DATE AS settlementDate, c.INSTRUCTED_CUR AS instructedCur, c.INSTRUCTED_AMT AS instructedAmt, c.CHG_AGT_ID AS chgAgtId, c.CHG_AGT_BIC AS chgAgtBic, c.CHG_CUR AS chgCur, c.CHG_AMT AS chgAmt, c.DEBTOR_NAME AS debtorName, c.DEBTOR_ACCTNO AS debtorAcctno, c.DEBTOR_ACCTNO_TYPE AS debtorAcctnoType, c.DEBTOR_AGT_ID AS debtorAgtId, c.DEBTOR_AGT_BIC AS debtorAgtBic, c.CREDITOR_NAME AS creditorName, c.CREDITOR_ACCTNO AS creditorAcctno, c.CREDITOR_ACCTNO_TYPE AS creditorAcctnoType, c.CREDITOR_AGT_ID AS creditorAgtId, c.CREDITOR_AGT_BIC AS creditorAgtBic FROM TB_TX_JNL a INNER JOIN
TB_TX_P110DAT c
TB_TX_P210DAT c
ON a.JNL_NO = c.JNL_NO AND a.JNL_NO=#{jnlNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

( SELECT a.JNL_NO AS jnlNo, a.TX_CODE AS txCode, c.SETTLEMENT_AMT AS settlementAmt, c.SETTLEMENT_DATE AS settlementDate, c.DEBTOR_NAME AS debtorName, c.DEBTOR_ACCTNO AS debtorAcctno, c.CREDITOR_NAME AS creditorName, c.CREDITOR_ACCTNO AS creditorAcctno FROM TB_TX_JNL a INNER JOIN TB_TX_P110DAT c ON a.JNL_NO = c.JNL_NO
AND (c.DEBTOR_NAME = #{cusName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR c.CREDITOR_NAME = #{cusName, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND (c.DEBTOR_ACCTNO = #{accountNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR c.DEBTOR_ACCTNO = #{accountNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND DATE_FORMAT(c.SETTLEMENT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{settleDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND a.TX_STAT ='REJCT'
AND a.TX_STAT = 'COMPL'
AND a.TX_STAT IN ('REJCT', 'COMPL')
)UNION ALL( SELECT a.JNL_NO AS jnlNo, a.TX_CODE AS txCode, c.SETTLEMENT_AMT AS settlementAmt, c.SETTLEMENT_DATE AS settlementDate, c.DEBTOR_NAME AS debtorName, c.DEBTOR_ACCTNO AS debtorAcctno, c.CREDITOR_NAME AS creditorName, c.CREDITOR_ACCTNO AS creditorAcctno FROM TB_TX_JNL a INNER JOIN TB_TX_P210DAT c ON a.JNL_NO = c.JNL_NO
AND (c.DEBTOR_NAME = #{cusName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR c.CREDITOR_NAME = #{cusName, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND (c.DEBTOR_ACCTNO = #{accountNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR c.CREDITOR_ACCTNO = #{accountNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND DATE_FORMAT(c.SETTLEMENT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{settleDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND 1 = 2
AND a.TX_STAT = 'COMPL'
)
